## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

input <- read_xls("dicionario_PNAD_CONTINUA_MICRODADOS_5_visita_2017.xls", col_names = F) %>% 
  rename(start     = X__1,
         tamanho   = X__2,
         col_names = X__3)

input <- input %>% 
  mutate(start = as.numeric(start)) %>% 
  select(start, tamanho, col_names) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(start))

input <- input %>% 
  mutate(end = start + tamanho - 1)

input <- input %>% 
  select(start, end, col_names)

colluns <- fwf_positions(start = input$start, end = input$end, col_names = input$col_names)

data <- read_fwf("PNADC_2017_entr5.txt", colluns)


```
